summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Birthday Gift Tracker app. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend functionality mostly working with excellent playful design, minor UI interaction issue with radio buttons in gift modal.

ui_bugs.issue: Radio buttons for occasion selection (Birthday/Christmas) not directly clickable due to hidden input styling
ui_bugs.workaround: Can click on parent div or text label instead

design_issues.issue: Charlie Brown shows 'Age -1' which indicates future birthday date causing negative age

passed_tests: Add kid functionality with form validation
Kid profile page with interests display
Add gift functionality (both birthday and christmas)
Gift display and sorting by year
Upcoming birthdays banner (shows kids within 30 days)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix age calculation for future dates (showing negative ages) and improve radio button accessibility in gift modal
